author: MySandita
title: A REAL NEW YORK HOTEL - Review
text:
THIS HOTEL is in a perfect location midtown New York City. It is old, remodeled and has the best set of concierges I know who will find you theater seats trendy and cheap restaurants and hints. Some of the great stars of the 30's and 40's have lived here-Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn- There is a breakfast buffet-expensive but excellent= the Museum of Modern Art is across the street hundreds of restaurants in the are and you can walk to Central Park TRUMP TOWER, 5th Avenue- a trendy bar and good service. Some of the rooms are dated but when in the middle of the Big Apple who cares-excellent friendly service!!! I always stay here ..Love it!
Room Tip: You have to ask- and prices depend on what you get-tell them you will not stay in a room facing a wa... See more room tips
